name: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
description: Layla is 8 years old and alone. She cannot remember her mother, nor her father. All she has is the clothes on her back and the uncanny ability to open her third eye and see into the nether to speak to the dead and demonic. But she has nightmares and the nightmare's are the same, the screaming...the warning. After an unfortunate instance - Layla locks herself away in her own mind - but even there she is not safe. Locked away with her own memories and the screams from her nightmares, her only option is to face her memories and problems head on to be able to escape the maze in her mind.
